snippet: Prosecutors in North Carolina agreed to let the N.F.L. see photographs from Hardy’s domestic-violence trial as the league considers whether to suspend Hardy.
abstract: Prosecutors agree to let NFL see evidence from domestic violence case against former Carolina Panthers defensive end Greg Hardy, now with Dallas Cowboys, as league considers whether to suspend him.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in North Carolina agreed to let the N.F.L. see photographs from Hardy’s domestic-violence trial as the league considers whether to suspend Hardy.

headline.main: N.F.L. to See Photos From Greg Hardy’s Trial
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. to See Photos in Hardy Case
